data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of P'yŏngan-namdo to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of P‘yŏngan-namdo, North Korea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 4,051,700 souls living in the state of P'yŏngan-namdo with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of P‘yŏngan-namdo, North Korea need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 4,051,700 citizens of P‘yŏngan-namdo, North Korea, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Deaf people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Deaf people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Deaf people is yours.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in P‘yŏngan-namdo, North Korea.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in P‘yŏngan-namdo, North Korea today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of P‘yŏngan-namdo, North Korea has a population of 4,051,700.

We estimate P'yŏngan-namdo has 63,590 people who might know Jesus, 3,558 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,984,552 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 63 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of P‘yŏngan-namdo, North Korea. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
